vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
WhaleGiveaway2.GetFreebie (0xf70d589d76eebdd7c12cc5eec99f8f6fa4233b9e.sol#8-13) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (0xf70d589d76eebdd7c12cc5eec99f8f6fa4233b9e.sol#11)
